subject: 7+r shifter
description_text:
Hello I was wondering if you have the firmware for this shifter. I messed
up programming another item and wrote over this shifters information and
now it does not work.

conversations.body_text: Hi travis egbert,    Please provide a video showing the issue, and I will assist you in checking and resolving it.

It only recognizes gear 1 and 2 and that is the only information I can get
off the computer. Hopefully this video works or helps.




On Sun, Sep 14, 2025 at 5:01 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi travis egbert,    Please provide your order number so that we can assist you with the recovery.

I ordered on Amazon last year in December 11th

Order number
114-5125699-3116240

On Sun, Sep 14, 2025 at 5:18 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi travis egbert,  This is the recovery file, and you will need to use FreeJoy version 1.7.0 to proceed.      ​

Perfect thank you so much that worked and now it is working as it should
again!!

On Wed, Sep 17, 2025 at 2:07 AM service@simsonn.com
Extremely professional and quick to respond and resolve the situation I had
